title: The State of Energy Affordability
summary: Deliver outstanding customer experiences, improve energy efficiency, and manage networks and assets so you can deliver essential services to your communities every day. Accelerate your energy transition to net-zero carbon emissions by combining Oracle Cloud technology with Accenture’s deep industry experience. Extend visibility to customer-owned grid edge distributed energy resources. Learn how Oracle’s Data Management and AI Services can help IT professionals apply spatial analytics to vegetation management, resulting in businesses being able to reduce revenue loss from power outages and take better predictive measures.

title: Canary Live Bay Area
summary: David Hochschild was appointed chair of the California Energy Commission by Governor Gavin Newsom in February 2019. For his work to advance clean energy, Hochschild was awarded the Sierra Club's Trailblazer Award, the American Lung Association's Clean Air Hero Award, and the U.S. Department of Energy's Million Solar Roof True Champion Award. His areas of expertise include renewable energy, smart grid, distributed energy resources, energy storage, demand response, and electric vehicles. Q&A on energy affordability with Mark Toney of TURN Canary Media's Julian Spector chats with Mark Toney, executive director of The Utility Reform Network, about how to rein in Californians' electric bills and promote energy justice.
